channel.title: Update server problem
channel.description: Hey there I have a problem and id like some help on teamview or any advice. I have port forwarded( 99% sure its ryt) i have set up a server and done the no-ip thing. The problem; when i turn the server on i can get in but my friends get stuck atconnecting to update server. I tried hamachi and they cant connect to me through that either. I gave my friend a copy of the server and we connected straight away wats the problem??? Can any one help???

item.title: Update server problem
item.dc:creator: @nz_lols nz lols
item.description:
@nz_lols wrote:

Thanks guys
I got it working thank you so much
Ill be making a thing about my server once we get somethings fixed.
see this post pls i need this help http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,401441.msg2976147.html#msg2976147
this is my mates topic we are making the server together so if u can answer any of these pls help

Read full topic

item.title: Update server problem
item.dc:creator: @HeyLewis HeyLewis
item.description:
@HeyLewis wrote:

I think he wanted to ditch hamachi, and get the portforwarding working guys.

Be patient, some people just need a little ‘decent’ help.

Read full topic

item.title: Update server problem
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“klomp3, post:11, topic:305469”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=401705.msg2977855#msg2977855 date=1254411038]

and if it still doesn’t works, check what you’ve portforwarded, check if you’re port is open or if you used the right port while portforwarding,

He said he used hamachi which doesn’t require portforwarding.
[/quote]

He said he portforwarded, and when that didn’t worked, he used hamachi…[/quote]

Yes and was there a point of continuing the argue?

Read full topic

item.title: Update server problem
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

yep but if you know anything about 508’s he said that his friends clients stop at connecting to update server which is what happens to 508 clients if the server is unreachable or offline…
I rest my case -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Update server problem
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

What’s with the beastly writing??? But yeah read this:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:2, topic:305469”]sounds like your using a 508 server… what you need is [size=30pt]TITAN CACHE!!![/size]
everyone who owns a 508 should know this.
it allows others to connect to 508 servers so just go to google and type in titan cache download and once downloaded install into c drive and hey presto… others will be able to [size=30pt]PLAY[/size] on your server!

—sorry for the oversized emphasis but some people just don’t notice those little things so i like to emphasize my main points—

[size=30pt][/size]—JAMES—[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Update server problem

everyone who owns a 508 should know this.
it allows others to connect to 508 servers so just go to google and type in titan cache download and once downloaded install into c drive and hey presto… others will be able to [size=30pt]PLAY[/size] on your server!

—sorry for the oversized emphasis but some people just don’t notice those little things so i like to emphasize my main points—
